title: Simulation-Based Education for Community Disaster Preparedness and Resilience Strengthening

context.prior_knowledge: Basic disaster management concepts and understanding of community activities
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen disaster preparedness capabilities among community members and corporate employees. Requires educational design considering diverse stakeholders (youth, medical personnel, local institution staff, etc.).

learning_goals: Learners can explain community-level crisis response procedures through disaster scenario simulations.
Learners can establish collaboration-based disaster response strategies by experiencing diverse stakeholder roles.
Learners can apply simulation techniques learned to actual disaster situations post-training and propose plans to enhance community resilience.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
